live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
30146.summary: Some customers in the Hounsfield Heights area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30146.title: Dec 7 – Calgary (Hounsfield Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
